summary: On the distant planet Axis, Kaena, a rebellious, high-spirited teenage girl, will defy the High Priest and her people's ancestral beliefs to take a perilous journey and discover what dark secrets lie beyond the clouds.
cast: Cécile de France|Michael Lonsdale|Victoria Abril|François Siener|Jean-Michel Farcy|Raymond Aquaviva|Jean Piat|Kirsten Dunst|Richard Harris|Anjelica Huston|Keith David|Michael McShane|Greg Proops|Tom Kenny|Tara Strong|Dwight Schultz|Gary Martin|John DiMaggio|Ciara Janson|Will Attenborough|Jennifer Darling|Cornell John
title: Kaena - La profecía
